snippet: Cristian Mungiu’s new film, “Beyond the Hills,” based on an actual incident in Romania, dissects authoritarianism and intolerance.
abstract: Cristian Mungiu film Beyond the Hills, which won two top prizes at Cannes Film Festival in 2012, is based on former BBC news correspondent Tatiana Niculescu Bran's dispassionate examination of a notorious real-life incident of abuse that took place in a Romanian Orthodox monastery in 2005.
lead_paragraph: Cristian Mungiu’s new film, “Beyond the Hills,” based on an actual incident in Romania, dissects authoritarianism and intolerance.

headline.seo: Cristian Mungiu’s New Film is ‘Beyond the Hills’
headline.main: Sacrifice at the Altar of Intolerance
